name: Magic Piano Tiles 3: Anime Pop
description:
Play Magic Piano Tiles 3: Anime & Pop Songs for free today!

Game Features:
1. Thousands of pop, anime, piano, kpop, rock & EDM songs. New songs updated regularly.
2. Easy and fun to play. Play piano game with two fingers. Be a pianist with ease.
3. Great graphics, smooth tiles gaming experience.

How to Play:
1. Tap the black tiles when it comes.
2. Tap and hold the long tile until the end.

# All songs are either licensed or copyright FREE.
